entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
